remarks: The value of the partial mapping operation. ` ( A ^pm B ) ` is the set of all partial functions that map from ` B ` to ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)
statement:
pmvalg $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ( A ^pm B ) = { f e. ~P ( B X. A ) | Fun f } ) $.
$d A f $.
$d B f $.
